headline: Investors should beware of AI's circular financing trap, look for alternatives like Broadcom
summary: Miramar Capital's Max Wasserman forecasts a "broadening" of the market in 2026.

raw.headline: Investors should beware of AI's circular financing trap, look for alternatives like Broadcom

headline: Are consumers actually in an 'alligator' shaped economy?
summary: While Miramar Capital Co-Founder and senior portfolio manager Max Wasserman shares his outlook on consumer-facing stocks like McDonald's (MCD) and Home Depot (HD) and what a lower interest rate environment may entail for them, Yahoo Finance senior retail reporter Brooke DiPalma goes on to describe how consumers may be operating in an "alligator" shaped economy rather than the K-shaped economy many economists have forecasted. Yahoo Finance senior markets reporter Ines Ferré weighs in on the metal commodities trade's impact on Home Depot. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

headline: Mining stocks jump as precious metals recover; European shares hit record as 2025 draws to a close
summary: European stocks picked up steam on Tuesday, extending gains to notch a fresh record high.
